description.timer: Control your time. It will help you increase your productivity. Improve your time management skills
description.projects: Keep a list of projects. This can help you stay organized and prioritize. Our brains are better at sorted toDO lists
description.clients: Keep a list of clients. Create client cards, know who trusts you. Important information in one place
description.statistics: Analyze your productivity by day, week. Make conclusions. Time is not just quantity; it's quality

mainPage.title: Time Tracker is app that let's you easily track your time
mainPage.subtitle: There are only 24 hours in a day, you can`t change that, but you can spend your time usefully
